description: A collection of paradox detectors highlighting contradictions between stated values and systemic behavior. Uses humor as a resilience mechanism and mirror for self-correction.

paradoxes.name: Stability Through Constant Change
paradoxes.example_quote: We must keep innovating to maintain consistency.
paradoxes.detected_pattern: Contradiction between change frequency and equilibrium claims.

paradoxes.name: Efficiency by Elimination of Redundancy
paradoxes.summary: Destroy all backups in the name of efficiency.
paradoxes.detected_pattern: Redundancy removal leading to catastrophic fragility.

paradoxes.name: Infinite Growth on a Finite Planet
paradoxes.summary: Treats planetary limits as investor FUD.

paradoxes.name: Metrics as Meaning
paradoxes.summary: The number went up, therefore life is good.

paradoxes.name: Smart Systems, Stupid Context
paradoxes.summary: Algorithms amplifying the problem they were built to solve.
paradoxes.example_quote: Our AI stopped bias—by removing all humans!

paradoxes.name: Innovation to Avoid Simplicity
paradoxes.summary: Invent a billion-dollar fix for a one-sentence habit change.
paradoxes.example_quote: Why walk when we can disrupt walking?
paradoxes.detected_pattern: Complex workaround preferred over obvious cooperation.

paradoxes.name: Progress as Permission
paradoxes.summary: Only act ethically when it can be branded as innovation.
paradoxes.detected_pattern: Moral action re-framed as market product.

laughter_recovery_suggestions: Pause and laugh intentionally for 7 seconds.
Name the paradox out loud before attempting a fix.
Translate policy language into stand-up comedy form to expose logic gaps.
